Text.Name: Practice
Text.Events.2.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name]'s mind started drifting toward [obj_friend]'s appearance while Training.
Text.Events.3.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly took an interest in the nearby [obj_nearthing] while Training.
Text.Events.5.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly started thinking of their own [obj_relation] while Training.
Text.Events.6.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. A great many thoughts and feelings began filling [name]'s mind while Training.
Text.Events.7.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly started to cry while Training.
Text.Events.9.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] felt the desire to visit [rand_lable=obj_unlockmapplace,obj_goodschool,obj_badschool] while Training.
Text.Events.10.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] thought that this lifestyle sure was great while at the same time Training.
Text.Events.11.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] thought that cultivators are great and all but they really don't have it easy while Training.
Text.Events.12.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] wanted to go down the mountain and have an adventure while Training.
Text.Events.13.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] was influenced by the emotion of[rand_lable=obj_badmood,obj_goodmood] while Training.
Text.Events.14.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] can't help but to worry about breaking through the plateau of [obj_neck] while Training.
Text.Events.15.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] sighed deeply realizing that [obj_gong] truly was profound while Training.
Text.Events.16.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] couldn't help but wonder if [obj_gong] really was something that was suitable for themselves while Training.
Text.Events.17.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly doubted [obj_esoterica] while Training, could it be that this Manual has an error?
Text.Events.18.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] couldn't help sighing at [obj_esoterica] while Training as this Manual truly is fantastic.
Text.Events.19.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] really wanted to try driving [obj_fabao] while Training, just to get a feel.
Text.Events.20.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] didn't know why but really wanted to eat a [obj_dan] while Training.
Text.Events.21.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] didn't know why but really wanted to take a stab at [obj_friend] while Training.
Text.Events.22.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] remembered the Practice Room at [obj_goodschool] while Training.
Text.Events.23.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly wanted a match with [obj_badschool] while Training.

Text.Events.6.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While smelting [obj] into an artifact, [name] lost focus, failed, and regretted it.
Text.Events.7.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] couldn't help but to worry about performing a Breakthrough while smelting [obj] into an artifact, failed at smelting it, and regretted it.
Text.Events.8.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] doubted their own ability while smelting [obj] into an artifact, failed at smelting it and regretted it

Text.Name: PaintCharm
Text.Events.2.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name]'s mind started drifting toward [obj_friend] while drawing [obj].
Text.Events.3.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly took an interest in the nearby [obj_nearthing] while drawing [obj].
Text.Events.4.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly wanted to eat [obj_food], while drawing [obj].
Text.Events.5.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly started thinking of [ITS] own [obj_relation], while drawing [obj].
Text.Events.6.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. A great many thoughts and feelings began filling 's mind, while drawing [obj].
Text.Events.7.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly started to cry, while drawing [obj].
Text.Events.9.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. [name] suddenly felt the desire to visit, while drawing [obj].
Text.Events.10.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] thought that this lifestyle sure was great.
Text.Events.11.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] thought that cultivators are great and all but they really don't have it easy.
Text.Events.12.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] wanted to go down the mountain and have an adventure.
Text.Events.13.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] was influenced by the emotion of[rand_lable=obj_badmood,obj_goodmood].
Text.Events.14.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] couldn't help but to worry about successfully performing [obj]'s Breakthrough.
Text.Events.15.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] sighed deeply realizing that [obj_gong] truly was profound.
Text.Events.16.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] couldn't help but wonder if [obj_gong] really was something that was suitable for themselves.
Text.Events.17.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] suddenly doubted [obj_esoterica], could it be that this Manual has an error?
Text.Events.18.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] couldn't help sighing at [obj_esoterica] as this Manual truly is fantastic.
Text.Events.19.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] really wanted to try driving [obj_fabao], just to get a feel.
Text.Events.20.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] didn't know why but really wanted to eat a [obj_dan].
Text.Events.21.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] didn't know why but really wanted to take a stab at [obj_friend].
Text.Events.22.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] remembered the Practice Room at [obj_goodschool].
Text.Events.23.Story: [rand_lable=desc_time,desc_place,desc_weather]. While busy drawing [obj], [name] suddenly wants a match with [obj_badschool].
